scripts.dpkg: yarn remove sass gulp gulp-concat gulp-sass gulp-babel gulp-plumber gulp-uglify gulp-watch gulp-zip gulp-javascript-obfuscator @babel/core @babel/preset-env
scripts.ipkg: yarn add --dev sass gulp gulp-concat gulp-sass gulp-babel gulp-plumber gulp-uglify gulp-watch gulp-zip gulp-javascript-obfuscator @babel/core @babel/preset-env
